title: Sambal Oelek Recipe
full_text:
Sambal Oelek Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
12 servings
Makes
1 1/2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
pound
hot red chiles, such as red jalapeños, fresnos, or
red serranos
2
tablespoons
rice vinegar
1
tablespoon
salt
Directions
Place chiles, vinegar, and salt in the workbowl of a food processor. Pulse until chiles are finely chopped and form a paste, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as necessary, Transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
Special Equipment
Food processor
Hot Sauces
Indonesian
Chile Pepper
